#.. autoclass:: geonodes.core.field.Field # :members:

class geonodes.core.field.Radius(geo_domain)

Field Radius

Implementation:

  • get: nodes.Radius

  • set: nodes.SetPointRadius or nodes.SetCurveRadius

  • selectable: True

Note

There are two setter for raidus, depending on the domain:

  • POINT : SetPointRadius

  • CURVE : SetCurveRadius

create_input_node()
Blender reference : GeometryNodeInputRadius, Node GeometryNodeInputRadius

set_value(value)
Blender reference : GeometryNodeSetPointRadius, Node GeometryNodeSetPointRadius
